#summary Examples of using pyactivemq.

= Sending pickled Python objects =

This example shows how to send pickled Python objects (in this case, [http://www.scipy.org/ NumPy] arrays).

[http://code.google.com/p/pyactivemq/source/browse/trunk/src/examples/numpypickle.py]

= Asynchronous message listener =

The latest code in trunk (added after pyactivemq 0.0.2 was released) supports asynchronous message listeners.

[http://code.google.com/p/pyactivemq/source/browse/trunk/src/examples/asynclistener.py]

= Durable subscription =

This example corresponds to the DurableSubscriberExample.java described in the [http://java.sun.com/javaee/5/docs/tutorial/doc/ Java EE 5 Tutorial] in Chapter 31 under Creating Robust JMS Applications.

[http://code.google.com/p/pyactivemq/source/browse/trunk/src/examples/DurableSubscriberExample.py]
